headline: Adaptive Traffic Control Systems (ATCS) Market Outlook 2025-2034 Featuring Strategic Analysis of Siemens, IBM, Johnson Controls, Indra Sistemas, TransCore Atlantic & More
summary: Urbanization and road safety initiatives drive market expansion. Key trends include AI advancements and cloud solutions.Dublin, Aug. 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Adaptive Traffic Control System Global Market Report 2025" has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering. The adaptive traffic control system (ATCS) market is experiencing a significant surge in growth, expected to swell from $6.03 billion in 2024 to $7.07 billion in 2025.
